item.title: Fixing relative and absolute links in Word, Microsoft Office 2013, Office 2016, Office 2019
item.description: This article explains how to replace absolute hyperlink references with relative ones, which makes your Microsoft Word document and linked files portable. So when you send them to a different computer, clicking on the hyperlink will open the file that you shipped with the Word document and not try to open the file that is on the computer where you wrote the document. Say you are writing a final report for a survey and you have a link to the original contract, which is in a folder in the same directory as your report.
